ChangeList.Description: Added the **decisionHistoriesForReviewersEnabled** property to the [accessReviewScheduleSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewScheduleSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **stageSettings** property to the [accessReviewScheduleDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewScheduleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **stages** relationship to the [accessReviewInstance](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewInstance?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [stop](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/accessReviewStage-stop?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [accessReviewStage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewStage?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [filterByCurrentUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/accessReviewStage-filterByCurrentUser?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [accessReviewStage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessReviewStage?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
